extracted_text:
The maximum height is 60 feet in the district. However, the maximum height in the
district abutting property used or zoned for single family residential is 40 feet,
except the height may exceed 40 feet if there is an increase in side and rear yards
of one foot for every foot of building height over 40 feet up to the 60 feet
maximum.
llm_output.rationale: This section explicitly states the maximum height allowed in the HW district, which is 60 feet generally, with some restrictions near single family residential areas.
